title: 148864240.the Man With The Best Tools Wins
excerpt: It’s no surprise that you’ll often win a race with a faster car.

children.text: It’s no surprise that you’ll often win a race with a faster car.
So why do some people begrudgingly switch to using newer, faster, better tools to do their jobs effectively?
It took a while for email to catch on given the prevalence of snail mail. And now that it’s widely accepted, many teams still prefer it over Slack, often to their detriment.
Organizations and people that pivot fast, that adopt and embrace new tools and paradigms almost always gain an advantage over those that fall behind.
